    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public final String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • equals

        public final boolean equals(Object other)
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

      • getName

        public final String getName()
        Name of the tracked visual. If no name is provided, the remaining settings will be applied whenever tracking is triggered in the GUI.

      • getMinDist

        public final Double getMinDist()
        Minimum distance between the camera and the tracked visual. This parameter is only used if static is set to false.

      • getMaxDist

        public final Double getMaxDist()
        Maximum distance between the camera and the tracked visual. This parameter is only used if static is set to false.

      • getIsStatic

        public final Boolean getIsStatic()
        If set to true, the position of the camera is fixed relatively to the model or to the world, depending on the value of the use_model_frame element. Otherwise, the position of the camera may vary but the distance between the camera and the model will depend on the value of the min_dist and max_dist elements. In any case, the camera will always follow the model by changing its orientation.

      • getUseModelFrame

        public final Boolean getUseModelFrame()
        If set to true, the position of the camera is relative to the model reference frame, which means that its position relative to the model will not change. Otherwise, the position of the camera is relative to the world reference frame, which means that its position relative to the world will not change. This parameter is only used if static is set to true.

      • getXyz

        public final Vector3D getXyz()
        The position of the camera's reference frame. This parameter is only used if static is set to true. If use_model_frame is set to true, the position is relative to the model reference frame, otherwise it represents world coordinates.

      • getInheritYaw

        public final Boolean getInheritYaw()
        If set to true, the camera will inherit the yaw rotation of the tracked model. This parameter is only used if static and use_model_frame are set to true.

      • setName

        public final void setName(String name)
        Name of the tracked visual. If no name is provided, the remaining settings will be applied whenever tracking is triggered in the GUI.

      • setMinDist

        public final void setMinDist(Double minDist)
        Minimum distance between the camera and the tracked visual. This parameter is only used if static is set to false.

      • setMaxDist

        public final void setMaxDist(Double maxDist)
        Maximum distance between the camera and the tracked visual. This parameter is only used if static is set to false.

      • setIsStatic

        public final void setIsStatic(Boolean isStatic)
        If set to true, the position of the camera is fixed relatively to the model or to the world, depending on the value of the use_model_frame element. Otherwise, the position of the camera may vary but the distance between the camera and the model will depend on the value of the min_dist and max_dist elements. In any case, the camera will always follow the model by changing its orientation.

      • setUseModelFrame

        public final void setUseModelFrame(Boolean useModelFrame)
        If set to true, the position of the camera is relative to the model reference frame, which means that its position relative to the model will not change. Otherwise, the position of the camera is relative to the world reference frame, which means that its position relative to the world will not change. This parameter is only used if static is set to true.

      • setXyz

        public final void setXyz(Vector3D xyz)
        The position of the camera's reference frame. This parameter is only used if static is set to true. If use_model_frame is set to true, the position is relative to the model reference frame, otherwise it represents world coordinates.

      • setInheritYaw

        public final void setInheritYaw(Boolean inheritYaw)
        If set to true, the camera will inherit the yaw rotation of the tracked model. This parameter is only used if static and use_model_frame are set to true.

      • builder

        public static final TrackVisual.Builder builder()
